EmailTemplate.description: To let idea submitter know of status change
EmailTemplate.name: Idea Status Change
EmailTemplate.subject: Idea Status Change
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
The status of an idea you submitted to the Idea Exchange has been updated. The status for the idea below is now {!Idea.Status}.
{!Idea.Title}
If you have comments or questions, please log onto the Community at Illumina, go to the Idea Exchange and post your comments there.
Thanks again for your feedback!
The Community at Illumina 5200 Illumina Way San Diego, CA 92122
